sen.j: 中村 亀鶴（なかむら きかく）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Kikaku NAKAMURA is a kabuki actor.
Kikaku NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor.
Kikaku NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor.

sen.j: 当代は2代目。
sen.e: Current Kikaku NAKAMURA is the second.
Current Kikaku NAKAMURA is the second.
Current Kikaku NAKAMURA is the second.

sen.j: 定紋は向い亀鶴菱。
sen.e: His jomon (family crest) is Kikakubishi.
The Jomon (family crest) is Mukai Kikaku Bishi (向い亀鶴菱, literally, Kikaku's opposite squares).
sen.cmt: 読み不明の漢字を補足し、表現を合わせました。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Mukai Kikaku Bishi (向い亀鶴菱, literally, Kikaku's opposite squares).

sen.j: 中村亀鶴 (初代)（1948年9月30日 - 1994年3月20日）本名・渡辺栄治郎。
sen.e: Kikaku NAKAMURA (the first) (September 30, 1948 - March 20, 1994), real name: Eijiro WATANABE
Kikaku NAKAMURA (the first) (September 30, 1948 - March 20, 1994): His real name was Eijiro WATANABE.
Kikaku NAKAMURA (the first) (September 30, 1948 - March 20, 1994): His real name was Eijiro WATANABE.

sen.j: 屋号は天王寺屋 (歌舞伎)。
sen.e: His yago was Tennojiya (kabuki).
The stage family name was Tennojiya (Kabuki).
The stage family name was Tennojiya (Kabuki).

sen.j: 中村富十郎 (4代目)と中村芳子（島原・夕霧太夫）との子。
sen.e: He was a son of the couple of Tomijuro NAKAMURA (the fourth) and Yoshiko NAKAMURA (Shimabara, Yugiri tayu).
He was a son of Tomijuro NAKAMURA (the fourth) and Yoshiko NAKAMURA (also known as Shimabara Yugiri tayu).
He was a son of Tomijuro NAKAMURA (the fourth) and Yoshiko NAKAMURA (also known as Shimabara Yugiri tayu).

sen.j: 中村芳子は中村鴈治郎 (初代)の末娘。
sen.e: Yoshiko NAKAMURA was the youngest daughter of Ganjiro NAKAMURA (the first).
Yoshiko NAKAMURA was the youngest daughter of Ganjiro NAKAMURA (the first).
Yoshiko NAKAMURA was the youngest daughter of Ganjiro NAKAMURA (the first).

sen.j: 父が吾妻徳穂との間に中村富十郎 (5代目)と山田元靖を儲けたあと、中村芳子と結婚して生まれた。
sen.e: His father married Yoshiko NAKAMURA after having Tomijuro NAKAMURA (the fifth) and Motoyasu YAMADA between Tokuho AZUMA, and he was born to the couple.
His father had Tomijuro NAKAMURA (the fifth) and Motoyasu YAMADA between Tokuho AZUMA before married Yoshiko NAKAMURA to have Kikaku.
His father had Tomijuro NAKAMURA (the fifth) and Motoyasu YAMADA between Tokuho AZUMA before married Yoshiko NAKAMURA to have Kikaku.

sen.j: 従って当代富十郎の異母弟。
sen.e: Therefore, he is the younger paternal half-brother of current Tomijuro.
Therefore, he was the younger paternal half-brother of current Tomijuro.
Therefore, he was the younger paternal half-brother of current Tomijuro.

sen.j: 1954年1月大阪歌舞伎座の「盲目物語」の小督役で中村栄治郎の名で初舞台。
sen.e: He made a debut at Osaka Kabukiza Theater in January 1954 under the name of Eijiro NAKAMURA and played a role of Kogo in the drama "Momoku Monogatari".
He made a debut at Osaka Kabuki-za theater in January 1954 under the name of Eijiro NAKAMURA and played a role of Kogo in the drama 'Momoku Monogatari' (Blind Man's Tale).
He made a debut at Osaka Kabuki-za theater in January 1954 under the name of Eijiro NAKAMURA and played a role of Kogo in the drama 'Momoku Monogatari' (Blind Man's Tale).

sen.j: 新歌舞伎座出演中に、京都の知人女性のマンションから転落死。
sen.e: He fell to his death from the apartment of a female aquaintance in Kyoto while he was performing at Shin Kabukiza Theater.
He fell to his death from the apartment of a female acquaintance in Kyoto while he was performing at Shin Kabuki-za Theater.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。
sen.e: He fell to his death from the apartment of a female acquaintance in Kyoto while he was performing at Shin Kabuki-za Theater.

sen.j: 自殺の疑いがもたれ警察で調べたが、結論は公表されていない。
sen.e: Although the police investigated the possibility of suicide, but the results were not publicized.
Although the police investigated the possibility of suicide, but the results were not publicized.
Although the police investigated the possibility of suicide, but the results were not publicized.

sen.j: 中村亀鶴 (2代目)（1972年6月18日 -）屋号は八幡屋。
sen.e: Kikaku NAKAMURA (the second) (June 18, 1972 -), his yago is Yawataya.
Kikaku NAKAMURA (the second) (June 18, 1972 -): The stage family name is Yawataya.
Kikaku NAKAMURA (the second) (June 18, 1972 -): The stage family name is Yawataya.

sen.j: 初代の長男。
sen.e: He is the oldest son of the first.
He is the oldest son of the first.
He is the oldest son of the first.

sen.j: 旧名・中村芳彦。
sen.e: His former name was Yoshihiko NAKAMURA.
He formerly called himself Yoshihiko NAKAMURA.
He formerly called himself Yoshihiko NAKAMURA.

sen.j: 京都府生まれ。
sen.e: He was born in Kyoto.
He was born in Kyoto.
He was born in Kyoto.

sen.j: 初代中村鴈治郎の愛娘中村芳子の孫。
sen.e: He is a grandson of Yoshiko NAKAMURA, a daughter of the first Ganjiro NAKAMURA.
He is a grandson of Yoshiko NAKAMURA, a beloved daughter of the first Ganjiro NAKAMURA.
He is a grandson of Yoshiko NAKAMURA, a beloved daughter of the first Ganjiro NAKAMURA.

sen.j: 四歳の時、『時雨の炬燵』の倅勘太郎で初舞台。
sen.e: He made a debut when he was four years old and played a role of Segare Kantaro in the drama "Shigure no Kotatsu".
He made a debut at the age of four, playing a role of Segare Kantaro (a son named Kantaro) in the drama "Shigure no Kotatsu" (The coverlet drenched with tears).
sen.cmt: 表現を変え、用語集に合わせ補足しました。
sen.e: He made a debut at the age of four, playing a role of Segare Kantaro (a son named Kantaro) in the drama "Shigure no Kotatsu" (The coverlet drenched with tears).

sen.j: 御曹司といわれる出生ながら、国立劇場の第十期歌舞伎研修生養成所出身という珍しい経歴を持つ。
sen.e: Though he is the son of a noble family in the kabuki world, he studied at the tenth graduating class of Kabuki Actor Training Center of National Theater of Japan.
Being the son of a distinguished family, he has a unique career as the 10th graduating class of Kabuki Actor Training Center of National Theater of Japan.
Being the son of a distinguished family, he has a unique career as the 10th graduating class of Kabuki Actor Training Center of National Theater of Japan.

sen.j: 中村富十郎の部屋子（弟子）時代を経て、2001年に2代目中村亀鶴襲名。
sen.e: After having learned as a disciple of Tomijuro NAKAMURA, he succeeded to the second Kikaku NAKAMURA in 2001.
After having learned as a disciple of Tomijuro NAKAMURA, he succeeded to the second Kikaku NAKAMURA in 2001.
After having learned as a disciple of Tomijuro NAKAMURA, he succeeded to the second Kikaku NAKAMURA in 2001.

sen.j: 歌舞伎に適した錦絵のような古風な舞台顔に、柔らかい身体に恵まれている。
sen.e: He has an old-looking face, such as that of painted in nishiki-e, that is suitable for kabuki, and he is lithe in build.
He has an old-looking face, such as that of in Nishiki-e (colored woodblock print), that is suitable for kabuki, and he is lithe in build.
He has an old-looking face, such as that of in Nishiki-e (colored woodblock print), that is suitable for kabuki, and he is lithe in build.

sen.j: 口跡のよさと、踊りに定評がある。
sen.e: He is known for his elocution on the stage and dancing.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: He is known for his elocution on the stage and dancing.
He is known for his elocution on the stage and dancing.

sen.j: 2004年（平成16年）大阪松竹座での浪花花形歌舞伎での『女殺油地獄』の河内屋与兵衛では現代にも通じる屈折した青年の心情を細やかに演じ、翳りのある色気がこのひとの魅力の一つであることをみせた。
sen.e: In 2004, he played a role of Yohe KAWACHIYA in the drama "Onnagoroshi Abura no Jigoku" at Osaka Shochikuza Theater, expressed a warped mind of young man delicately and showed shadowy attractiveness as one of his charms.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: In 2004, he played a role of Yohei KAWACHIYA in the drama "Onna koroshi abura no jigoku" (The Woman-killer and the Hell of Oil) at Osaka Shochiku-za Theater, expressed a warped mind of young man delicately and showed shadowy attractiveness as one of his charms.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせ、補足しました。
sen.e: In 2004, he played a role of Yohei KAWACHIYA in the drama "Onna koroshi abura no jigoku" (The Woman-killer and the Hell of Oil) at Osaka Shochiku-za Theater, expressed a warped mind of young man delicately and showed shadowy attractiveness as one of his charms.

sen.j: 2006年には劇団コーンフレークス『センチメンタル・ヤスコ』天童役で現代劇にも参加した。
sen.e: He played a role of Tendo in a contemporary drama "Sentimental Yasuko" performed by theatrical troupe Cornflakes in 2006.
He played a role of Tendo in a contemporary drama "Sentimental Yasuko" performed by theatrical troupe Cornflakes in 2006.
He played a role of Tendo in a contemporary drama "Sentimental Yasuko" performed by theatrical troupe Cornflakes in 2006.

sen.j: 平成11年国立劇場特別賞。
sen.e: Special Award of National Theater 1999
Received the Special Award of National Theater 1999.
Received the Special Award of National Theater 1999.

sen.j: 12年日本俳優協会奨励賞。
sen.e: Encouragement Award of Japan Actors' Association 2000
Received the Encouragement Award of Japan Actors' Association 2000.
Received the Encouragement Award of Japan Actors' Association 2000.

sen.j: 平成18年京都府文化賞奨励賞。
sen.e: Kyoto Prefecture Cultural Prize, Encouragement Award 2006
Received the Kyoto Prefecture Cultural Prize, Encouragement Award 2006.
Received the Kyoto Prefecture Cultural Prize, Encouragement Award 2006.
